ðŸ“– Summary: Tartube is a GUI front-end for youtube-dl, yt-dlp, and other compatible video downloaders. It allows users to easily download videos from YouTube, Twitch, Odysee, and hundreds of other sites, organize them into folders, and receive alerts for livestreams and debut videos.
